title: Nicola Richards – 2022 Comments on Penny Mordaunt Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Nicola Richards, the Conservative MP for West Bromwich East, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
I’m backing Penny Mordaunt to unite our party, deliver our 2019 manifesto and win the general election.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

I know Penny will be the stabilising, calm and collected figure we need to see us through the turbulent times ahead.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
